thread.title: Royal Caribbean Offering Excursion Credit This Weekend
thread.title_full: Royal Caribbean Offering Excursion Credit This Weekend

title: Royal Caribbean Offering Excursion Credit This Weekend
text:
Royal Caribbean Offering Excursion Credit This Weekend August 13, 2015 
To celebrate its new shore excursion program, Royal Caribbean International is offering a $150 credit on all new reservations completed this weekend, Aug. 14 to 16. The new program groups its shore excursions into categories based on guest interest like Active Adventures, Family Connections and Culinary Delights, with each category featuring new offerings. More information, as well as information on other Royal Caribbean sales, can be found here . 0
